chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4

chunks.text: then the range of negative numbers

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: that range will go to positive numbers

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: so it will be range from 0 to 255

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: so we can store 256 numbers in tiny int

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: if we say that we want to store negative numbers

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: then we have to store positive

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: so the range of negative numbers will increase

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: so we can increase the range of our numbers

chunks.title: 37 #p3.mp4
chunks.text: if we have only positive numbers
